thread.title: LIVE Punjab Assembly election results: Who will win state's three-cornered fight?
thread.title_full: LIVE Punjab Assembly election results: Who will win state's three-cornered fight?

title: LIVE Punjab Assembly election results: Who will win state's three-cornered fight?
text:
Punjab Assembly Election 2017 Punjab Assembly election results LIVE: Who will win state's three-cornered fight? For the first time in recent history, Punjab is seeing a three-cornered fight for its Assembly. The ruling Shimoni Akali Dal-Bharatiya Janata Party alliance is facing a tough fight from Congress and the Aam Aadmi Party. IndiaToday.in | Edited by Dev Goswami A + A - 
For the first time in recent history, Punjab is witnessing a three-cornered fight for its 117-seat Assembly. 
The ruling Shiromani Akali Dal-Bharatiya Janata Party alliance, which has been in office for two terms, is facing a tough fight from the Congress and state politics debutant, Aam Aadmi Party. ASSEMBLY ELECTIONS 2017: FULL COVERAGE 
If exit polls are to be believed, the SAD-BJP combine is looking at a rout, with some polls predicting that the alliance will fail to even reach double digits in the 2017 Vidhan Sabha polls. 
Counting begins at 8 am at 54 centres in 27 locations where the state election commission has deployed more than 14,000 officials.
